name: Vadim's Surge
flavorText: Master Vadim found that in his later years, it took him longer to recover from each spellcasting. He created a focus that would allow him to cast much more quickly, but soon after fell prey to dementia and became quite dangerous.
flavorTextHtml: Master Vadim found that in his later years, it took him longer to recover from each spellcasting. He created a focus that would allow him to cast much more quickly, but soon after fell prey to dementia and became quite dangerous.

secondary.textHtml: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.
secondary.text: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.
